frontmatter.title: Network Performance Estimation through RSA Prediction (inProgress)

node.html: Machine learning project focused on predicting RSA metrics (Routing and Spectrum Assignment) in Elastic Optical Networks (EONs). Uses regression models (Linear Regression, Random Forest) to estimate performance metrics (e.g., utilization, transceiver count) based on network traffic and topology. Enables near-real-time network optimization by estimating results significantly faster than full simulations.
Python script that converts a DITA reference topic XML into a DITA keymap XML. Developed as part of a Dolby internship task to automate documentation workflows.

A Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) project focused on analyzing chest X-ray images for the automated detection of Pneumonia, aiding in rapid diagnosis.

Dataset: Trained using the public Chest X-Ray Images (Pneumonia) Kaggle dataset. Metrics: Evaluated primarily on ROC-AUC and Sensitivity (Recall) to minimize false negative diagnoses.
Python-based simulator for asymmetric cryptography concepts. Demonstrates key generation, encryption, decryption, and basic experiments to visualize how public-key systems behave.
Python project focused on route optimization and path planning. Implements and compares routing strategies to find efficient paths under different constraints and problem settings.
Comparison of Dijkstra and Bellman-Ford shortest path algorithms, including implementation, analysis, and performance evaluation on different graph types.
A collection of small Python mini-projects and experiments, exploring algorithms, data processing, and fun scripting ideas for learning and prototyping.

Infrastructure codebase for shared mobile banking components, including common services, models, and utilities used across multiple banking apps (e.g. Mobimal, Wahda Mobile, Sahara Mobile).

This project is private and cannot be publicly shared, as it contains company-owned banking architecture, internal API structures, and sensitive infrastructure logic used in production systems.
Web application that retrieves customer and transaction data from a given API and displays it in a user-friendly format, with basic filtering and visualization.
Fork of the Daniels personal portfolio website. Static HTML/CSS template with light JavaScript enhancements for smooth scrolling and interactive sections.
Mini web app that displays a random quote on demand, built with plain HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to practice DOM manipulation and simple UI logic.
Simple bookmark manager website that lets users add, list, and manage their favorite links directly in the browser using JavaScript and local storage.
Smart Login System web app implementing a basic authentication flow using vanilla JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, with form validation and persistent sessions.
Small project experimenting with CSS Grid layouts to understand modern responsive layout techniques.

A dedicated corporate banking application for Jumhouria Bank, providing specialized financial tools and multi-level authorization for business accounts and enterprise transactions.

Worked on implementing complex business logic, user authentication flows tailored for corporate access, and integration with the bank’s core system.

Sahara Bank’s application designed for corporate and business users, facilitating large volume transactions, payroll services, and comprehensive account reporting under strict security protocols.

My contributions focused on developing the corporate transaction modules and optimizing data synchronization for high-demand business environments.

Official mobile application for Sahara Bank's retail customers. Enables users to access statements, manage accounts, and execute banking operations with a secure, modern interface.

Key contributions included API consumption, optimization of transaction speeds, and bug resolution across both mobile platforms.

Mobile banking application for Jumhouria Bank, providing advanced account management, transfers, and a range of financial services. Built with a focus on high security and performance for a large user base.

My role involved contributing to secure API integration, developing core features (transfers/payments), and optimizing the multi-platform deployment pipeline.
